item.title: As bubble debate rages, a new study finds why companies are getting stuck by the AI productivity paradox
item.description: Companies do benefit from attracting AI workers, but only from lean organizations, study finds

item.title: Social Security survivor benefits from my late husband are not enough. Can I claim more on his record?
item.description: “My ex-husband passed away four years ago. We were married for 20 years.”

item.title: Novo Nordisk downgrades sales outlook again amid bidding war with Pfizer for Metsera
item.description: Management lowers full-year guidance, warns about competition, launches bid for Metsera.

item.title: I invested $200K in my daughter’s 529 plan. She doesn’t want to go to college. What should I do with this money?
item.description: “Are there any other ways I can consider transferring the wealth to her?”

item.title: ‘It’s survival math every month’: The rent crisis that got Zohran Mamdani elected goes far beyond New York City
item.description: The mayor-elect built his campaign around rent affordability. But the same issue applies across the country, according to experts — and the many peopl...
